pr_title: [tellstick] Fix auto-detect handling for Rain and Wind devices

timeline.bodyText: If you are going to use units I would suggest using UoM for this as well.
timeline.author: cpmeister
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -87,59 +91,59 @@
 		<item-type>Number</item-type>
 		<label>Rainrate</label>
 		<description>The current rain rate</description>
-		<state pattern="%d" readOnly="true" />
+		<state pattern="%d mm" readOnly="true" />
 	</channel-type>
 
 	<channel-type id="raintotal">
 		<item-type>Number</item-type>
 		<label>Total Rain</label>
 		<description>Total rain</description>
-		<state pattern="%d" readOnly="true">
+		<state pattern="%d mm" readOnly="true">

replies.bodyText: Agreed, I will fix that too.
replies.author: jannegpriv
